radiographic_examinations.findings: Multifocal, dispersed, and bilateral testicular calcifications in slightly atrophic testicles.

Discrete hypoechogenicity of testicle with multiple lumpy calcifications; no tumorous mass was detected. Ultrasonography of the thyroid gland disclosed several hypoechogenic areas suspected as adenomas.
Two newly developed heart masses located in the right ventricular chamber, appearing as sessile or pedunculated masses measuring 1.98 x 3.78 cm and 4.87 x 3.16 cm respectively.
